resources.string: Tag already in store, do you want to overwrite tag? Only do this if the current card is a fresh, unused card!
No tag in store, save this tag? Only do this if the card is a fresh, unused card!
The touched tag is not the tag in store. Please touch the right tag or save this one in the app.
The tag reset to stored tag successfully!
Something went wrong while reseting the tag. Please try again.
